cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitori

sentence.kanji: そこには私一人しかいなかった。
sentence.romaji: soko ni ha watashi hitori shika inakata
sentence.english: I was the only one there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nani

sentence.kanji: 夕食には何を食べたいですか。
sentence.romaji: yuushoku ni ha nani wo tabetai desu ka
sentence.english: What would you like for supper?

cards.english: take a day off, take a break
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yasumu

sentence.kanji: 明日、会社を休みます。
sentence.romaji: ashita kaisha wo yasumimasu
sentence.english: I'm off work tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukau

sentence.kanji: このパソコンを使ってください。
sentence.romaji: kono pasokon wo tsukate kudasai
sentence.english: Please use this computer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoka

sentence.kanji: 他に方法がありません。
sentence.romaji: hoka ni houhou ga arimasen
sentence.english: There's no other way.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sumu

sentence.kanji: 彼は会社の近くに住んでいる。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaisha no chikaku ni sunde iru
sentence.english: He lives near his office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's goshujin

sentence.kanji: ご主人はお元気ですか。
sentence.romaji: goshujin ha ogenki desu ka
sentence.english: How is your husband?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otona

sentence.kanji: お酒は大人になってから。
sentence.romaji: osake ha otona ni nate kara
sentence.english: You can drink alcohol when you're an adult.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suwaru

sentence.kanji: 私は窓側の席に座った。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha madogawa no seki ni suwata
sentence.english: I sat in a window seat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yasashii

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても優しい人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo yasashii hito desu
sentence.english: He's a very kind person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hito

sentence.kanji: 彼は優しい人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yasashii hito desu
sentence.english: He's a nice guy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tetsudau

sentence.kanji: 私が手伝いましょう。
sentence.romaji: watashi ga tetsudaimashou
sentence.english: Can I help you?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's karada

sentence.kanji: 私は体が丈夫だ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha karada ga joubu da
sentence.english: I'm physically strong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuujitsu

sentence.kanji: 休日は家でよくテレビを見ます。
sentence.romaji: kyuujitsu ha ie de yoku terebi wo mimasu
sentence.english: I often watch television at home on my days off.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanami

sentence.kanji: 友達と花見をしました。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi to hanami wo shimashita
sentence.english: I went cherry blossom-viewing with a friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikata

sentence.kanji: ファイルのダウンロードの仕方が分かりません。
sentence.romaji: fuairu no daunro-do no shikata ga wakarimasen
sentence.english: I don't know how to download the file.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yasumi

sentence.kanji: 木曜日は仕事が休みです。
sentence.romaji: mokuyoubi ha shigoto ga yasumi desu
sentence.english: Thursday is my day off work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinkou

sentence.kanji: その国の人口はどのくらいですか。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni no jinkou ha dono kurai desu ka
sentence.english: What's the population of that country?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oku

sentence.kanji: 世界人口は65億人だ。
sentence.romaji: sekai jinkou ha rokujuugookunin da
sentence.english: The world's population is 6.5 billion people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyuuniku

sentence.kanji: 夕食に牛肉を買った。
sentence.romaji: yuushoku ni gyuuniku wo kata
sentence.english: I bought beef for dinner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's natsuyasumi

sentence.kanji: 今日が夏休み最後の日だ。
sentence.romaji: kyou ga natsuyasumi saigo no hi da
sentence.english: Today's the last day of summer vacation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaijin

sentence.kanji: この町には外人が少ない。
sentence.romaji: kono machi ni ha gaijin ga sukunai
sentence.english: There are few foreigners in this town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nan

sentence.kanji: 質問は何ですか。
sentence.romaji: shitsumon ha nan desu ka
sentence.english: What's the question?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's benri

sentence.kanji: インターネットはとても便利です。
sentence.romaji: inta-neto ha totemo benri desu
sentence.english: The Internet is very convenient.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kashidasu

sentence.kanji: その本は貸し出し中です。
sentence.romaji: sono hon ha kashidashichuu desu
sentence.english: That book is currently on loan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kipu

sentence.kanji: 東京までの切符を買った。
sentence.romaji: toukyou made no kipu wo kata
sentence.english: I bought a ticket to Tokyo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yachin

sentence.kanji: ここの家賃は12万円です。
sentence.romaji: koko no yachin ha juunimanen desu
sentence.english: The rent here is 120,000 yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jidai

sentence.kanji: 今は便利さとスピードの時代だ。
sentence.romaji: ima ha benrisa to supi-do no jidai da
sentence.english: This is the age of convenience and speed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaikokujin

sentence.kanji: 日本に住む外国人が増えています。
sentence.romaji: nihon ni sumu gaikokujin ga fuete imasu
sentence.english: The number of foreigners living in Japan is increasing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaeru

sentence.kanji: 社長に代えて部長を出席させます。
sentence.romaji: shachou ni kaete buchou wo shuseki sasemasu
sentence.english: I'll have the department manager attend in place of the president.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitoride

sentence.kanji: 今日は一人で映画を見ます。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha hitoride eiga wo mimasu
sentence.english: I saw a movie by myself today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitobito

sentence.kanji: あの村の人々はとても親切です。
sentence.romaji: ano mura no hitobito ha totemo shinsetsu desu
sentence.english: People in that village are very kind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kasu

sentence.kanji: 私は彼に本を貸しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare ni hon wo kashite imasu
sentence.english: I'm lending him the book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otonashii

sentence.kanji: 私の彼女はとても大人しいです。
sentence.romaji: watashi no kanojo ha totemo otonashii desu
sentence.english: My girlfriend's very quiet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinjiru

sentence.kanji: 彼はキリストを信じている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kirisuto wo shinjite iru
sentence.english: He believes in Christ.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kojin

sentence.kanji: これは私個人の意見です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha watashi kojin no iken desu
sentence.english: This is my personal opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zentai

sentence.kanji: 全体の80パーセントが完成しました。
sentence.romaji: zentai no hachijupa-sento ga kansei shimashita
sentence.english: 80 percent of the total was completed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's annai

sentence.kanji: 私が中をご案内します。
sentence.romaji: watashi ga naka wo goannai shimasu
sentence.english: I'll show you around inside.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seifu

sentence.kanji: そのデモについて政府は何もしなかった。
sentence.romaji: sono demo ni tsuite seifu ha nanimo shinakata
sentence.english: The government didn't do anything about the demonstration.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanika

sentence.kanji: 道に何か落ちています。
sentence.romaji: michi ni nanika ochite imasu
sentence.english: Something has fallen on the road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hisashiburi

sentence.kanji: 明日、久しぶりに友達に会います。
sentence.romaji: ashita hisashiburi ni tomodachi ni aimasu
sentence.english: Tomorrow I'm meeting a friend I haven't seen for a long time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jouken

sentence.kanji: この条件では厳し過ぎます。
sentence.romaji: kono jouken de ha kibishi sugimasu
sentence.english: It's too harsh under these conditions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichi

sentence.kanji: 私の町は東京の北に位置します。
sentence.romaji: watashi no machi ha toukyou no kita ni ichi shimasu
sentence.english: My town is located north of Tokyo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's basutei

sentence.kanji: 次のバス停で降ります。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no basutei de orimasu
sentence.english: I get off at the next bus stop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shukudai

sentence.kanji: 友達と一緒に宿題をした。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi to isho ni shukudai wo shita
sentence.english: I did my homework with a friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokunai

sentence.kanji: この携帯電話が使えるのは国内だけです。
sentence.romaji: kono keitai denwa ga tsukaeru no ha kokunai dake desu
sentence.english: You can only use this mobile phone domestically.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ta

sentence.kanji: 留学生はアジア人が多く、その他は3割です。
sentence.romaji: ryuugakusei ha ajiajin ga ooku sonota ha sanwari desu
sentence.english: The majority of foreign students are Asian, with 30 percent from other regions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shujin

sentence.kanji: 主人は今、留守です。
sentence.romaji: shujin ha ima rusu desu
sentence.english: My husband is out now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uchigawa

sentence.kanji: 白線の内側に下がってください。
sentence.romaji: hakusen no uchigawa ni sagate kudasai
sentence.english: Please step back behind the white line.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukougawa

sentence.kanji: 私の家は川の向こう側にあります。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ie ha kawa no mukougawa ni arimasu
sentence.english: My house is on the other side of the river.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sotogawa

sentence.kanji: 白線の外側を歩かないでください。
sentence.romaji: hakusen no sotogawa wo arukanai de kudasai
sentence.english: Please don't walk outside the white line.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hidarigawa

sentence.kanji: 画面の左側を見てください。
sentence.romaji: gamen no hidarigawa wo mite kudasai
sentence.english: Please look at the left side of the screen.
